area_name: Unknown Tower AKA Crystal Dick Tower

climbs.name: Unknown Tower aka Crystal Dick Tower

content.description:
Tower bagging in CCC? I guess so. Last year I noticed this tower walking up to Real Hidden Valley, wrangled up a choss buddy, and climbed the east side of the tower. We got on top, and what do you know.... rusty military piton ring. Kor? I mean he lived in Golden....

We opted to simul-rap off the tower (pretty cool rappel move to get off a tower).

In the photo, the red V indicates a good spot to simul-rap.
content.protection: A single rack of widgets (not phone apps).
content.location: This is right before/under Real Hidden Valley.

pathTokens: Unknown Tower AKA Crystal Dick Tower
